description: large, vertically-hung foam panels affixed to metal frame; two LED lights, on left side of panel, direct light towards two long, horizontal mirrors; mirrors are angled upward, toward foam panel, reflecting light and creating shadow and texture
dimension:
144 x 198 in. (365.76 x 502.92 cm) (object part, a. frame panel with two lights)
29 1/4 x 24 x 168 in. (74.3 x 60.96 x 426.72 cm) (object part, b. frame with two mirrors)
medium: Wood, metal, foam, paint, mirror, LED light
title: Hertzsprung (with reflector)
